author: pravin paunikar
text:
Valuable take away points from Maharastra Politics especially for #corporate #world employees 

Nvr resign before gettin offer.
Nvr disclose offer b4 last day.
Leave org on good notes.
Don't ask mre thn ur capabilities.
Don’t burn d bridges bhind u and alwys leave space fr retrn.
